detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Lotto.fallback() (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#83-101):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(msg.value - value) (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#90)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#93)
	- buyersLength = rounds[roundIndex].buyers.length ++ (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#95)
	- rounds[roundIndex].buyers[buyersLength] = msg.sender (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#96)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCountByBuyer[msg.sender] += ticketsCount (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#98)
	- rounds[roundIndex].ticketsCount += ticketsCount (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#99)
	- rounds[roundIndex].pot += value (unchecked_low_level_calls/etherpot_lotto/etherpot_lottoU2.sol#100)
